channel.title: Abouts on kalmai

item.title: About
item.description:
I graduated from BGSU in 2018 with a non-computer science degree, but it didn’t take long to realize I wanted something more challenging.

A friend introduced me to Tech Elevator, and it turned out to be the perfect fit. I completed their 3-month bootcamp and graduated in late 2020, right when remote roles were booming. My first professional developer job was at JPMC, though, truthfully, it wasn’t as coding-heavy as I hoped.

Hungry for more hands-on experience, I taught myself Ruby through The Odin Project. This gave me a deep understanding of the language and paved the way for my next role—a step up in both challenge and learning opportunity.
